fields.name: Mojito
fields.instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish and serve with straw.

fields.name: Old Fashioned
fields.instructions:
Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved.
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.

Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry.

fields.name: Long Island Tea
fields.instructions: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass. Add the splash of cola for color. Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.

fields.name: Negroni
fields.instructions: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

fields.name: Whiskey Sour
fields.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve. If served 'On the rocks', strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

fields.name: Dry Martini
fields.instructions: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

fields.name: Daiquiri
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

fields.name: Margarita
fields.instructions: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.

fields.name: Manhattan
fields.instructions: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

fields.name: Moscow Mule
fields.instructions: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish.

fields.name: After Dinner Cocktail
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

fields.name: After Supper Cocktail
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Alabama Slammer
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients (except for lemon juice) over ice in a highball glass. Stir, add a dash of lemon juice, and serve.

fields.name: Alaska Cocktail
fields.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass. Drop in a twist of lemon and serve.

fields.name: Alexander
fields.instructions: White creme de cacao. Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

fields.name: Brandy Alexander
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

fields.name: Alfie Cocktail
fields.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Algonquin
fields.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Allegheny
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the twist of lemon peel and serve.

fields.name: Allies Cocktail
fields.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Almeria
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

fields.name: Almond Joy
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Amaretto And Cream
fields.instructions: Shake well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Amaretto Mist
fields.instructions: Pour amaretto in an old-fashioned glass over crushed ice. Add the wedge of lime and serve. (A wedge of lemon may be substituted for lime, if preferred.)

fields.name: Amaretto Rose
fields.instructions: Pour amaretto and lime juice over ice in a collins glass. Fill with club soda and serve.

fields.name: Amaretto Stinger
fields.instructions: Shake ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Amaretto Tea
fields.instructions: Pour hot tea into a pousse-cafe glass, using a spoon in glass to prevent cracking. Add amaretto, but do not stir. Top with chilled whipped cream and serve.

fields.name: Angel Face
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass.

fields.name: Applecar
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Apricot Lady
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, apricot brandy, triple sec, lemon juice, and egg white. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the orange slice.

fields.name: Archbishop
fields.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

fields.name: Arise My Love
fields.instructions: Put creme de menthe into a champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne and serve.

fields.name: Arthur Tompkins
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Grand Marnier, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

fields.name: Artillery
fields.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Balmoral
fields.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

fields.name: Banana Daiquiri
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

fields.name: Bermuda Highball
fields.instructions: Pour brandy, gin, and dry vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

fields.name: Black Russian
fields.instructions: Pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

fields.name: Blackthorn
fields.instructions: Stir sloe gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

fields.name: Bloody Maria
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

fields.name: Bloody Mary
fields.instructions: Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish.

fields.name: Blue Lagoon
fields.instructions: Pour vodka and curacao over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, top with the cherry, and serve.

fields.name: Blue Margarita
fields.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime juice. Dip rim in coarse salt. Shake tequila, blue curacao, and lime juice with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

fields.name: Blue Mountain
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass alomst filled with ice cubes.

fields.name: Bluebird
fields.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine the gin, triple sec, Curacao, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist and the cherry.

fields.name: Bobby Burns Cocktail
fields.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

fields.name: Boomerang
fields.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, bitters, and maraschino liqueur. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

fields.name: Boston Sidecar
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Boston Sour
fields.instructions: Shake juice of lemon, powdered sugar, blended whiskey, and egg white with cracked ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

fields.name: Classic Old-Fashioned
fields.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube, using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the bourbon. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

fields.name: Bourbon Sling
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and bourbon. Shake well. Strain well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

fields.name: Bourbon Sour
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a whiskey sour glass, garnish with the orange slice and cherry.

fields.name: Boxcar
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

fields.name: Brandy Cobbler
fields.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the brandy. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

fields.name: Brandy Flip
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

fields.name: Brandy Sour
fields.instructions: Shake brandy, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the lemon slice, top with the cherry, and serve.

fields.name: Caipirinha
fields.instructions: Place lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with ice and add the Cachaça.

fields.name: California Lemonade
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over shaved ice. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with slices of orange and lemon. Add the cherry and serve with a straw.

fields.name: Casa Blanca
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Casino Royale
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

fields.name: Champagne Cocktail
fields.instructions: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by gently pouring chilled champagne. Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

fields.name: Cherry Rum
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Chicago Fizz
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

fields.name: Chocolate Black Russian
fields.instructions: Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

fields.name: City Slicker
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

fields.name: Clove Cocktail
fields.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Cuba Libre
fields.instructions: Build all ingredients in a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

fields.name: Dragonfly
fields.instructions: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and ginger ale. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

fields.name: Dry Rob Roy
fields.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

fields.name: Dubonnet Cocktail
fields.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

fields.name: English Highball
fields.instructions: Pour brandy, gin, and sweet vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

fields.name: English Rose Cocktail
fields.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim of glass in powdered sugar. Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into sugar-rimmed glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

fields.name: Flying Dutchman
fields.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and triple sec. Stir well.

fields.name: Flying Scotchman
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Foxy Lady
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Frisco Sour
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except slices of lemon and lime) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the slices of lemon and lime and serve.

fields.name: Frozen Daiquiri
fields.instructions: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for five seconds, then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute, top with the cherry, and serve.

fields.name: Frozen Mint Daiquiri
fields.instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

fields.name: Frozen Pineapple Daiquiri
fields.instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

fields.name: Gentleman's Club
fields.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

fields.name: Gin And Tonic
fields.instructions: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

fields.name: Gin Cooler
fields.instructions: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and add gin. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end of the orange spiral dangles over rim of glass.

fields.name: Gin Daisy
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the wine, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

fields.name: Gin Fizz
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into glass. Top with soda water.

fields.name: Gin Sling
fields.instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of water and juice of lemon. Add gin. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

fields.name: Gin Smash
fields.instructions: Muddle sugar with carbonated water and mint sprigs in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and 1 ice cube. Stir, add the orange slice and the cherry, and serve.

fields.name: Gin Sour
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

fields.name: Gin Squirt
fields.instructions: Stir gin, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with the pineapple chunks and the strawberries and serve.

fields.name: Gin Swizzle
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, gin, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a colling glass with ice cubes. Stir until the glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

fields.name: Gin Toddy
fields.instructions: Mix powdered sugar and water in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube. Stir, add the twist of lemon peel, and serve.

fields.name: Godchild
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

fields.name: Godfather
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

fields.name: Godmother
fields.instructions: Pour vodka and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

fields.name: Grass Skirt
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, pineapple juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the pineapple slice.

fields.name: Harvey Wallbanger
fields.instructions: Stir the vodka and orange juice with ice in the glass, then float the Galliano on top. Garnish and serve.

fields.name: Havana Cocktail
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

fields.name: Hawaiian Cocktail
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Highland Fling Cocktail
fields.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

fields.name: Imperial Fizz
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

fields.name: Irish Spring
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients (except orange slice and cherry) into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange, add the cherry on top, and serve.

fields.name: Jack Rose Cocktail
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Japanese Fizz
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

fields.name: Jewel Of The Nile
fields.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

fields.name: John Collins
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.

fields.name: Kamikaze
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients together with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

fields.name: Kentucky B And B
fields.instructions: Pour the bourbon and Benedictine into a brandy snifter.

fields.name: Kentucky Colonel
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the courbon and Benedictine. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

fields.name: Lady Love Fizz
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

fields.name: Loch Lomond
fields.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, Drambuie, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

fields.name: London Town
fields.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

fields.name: Lone Tree Cocktail
fields.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Lone Tree Cooler
fields.instructions: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice, add gin and vermouth, and stir. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

fields.name: Lord And Lady
fields.instructions: Pour the rum and Tia Maria into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

fields.name: Mai Tai
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish and serve with straw.

fields.name: Martinez Cocktail
fields.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

fields.name: Martini
fields.instructions: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

fields.name: Midnight Cowboy
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

fields.name: Mississippi Planters Punch
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

fields.name: Monkey Wrench
fields.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

fields.name: New York Sour
fields.instructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Float claret on top. Decorate with the half-slice of lemon and the cherry and serve.

fields.name: Orange Oasis
fields.instructions: Shake brandy, gin, and orange juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger beer, stir, and serve.

fields.name: Orgasm
fields.instructions: White creme de cacao. Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Pink Gin
fields.instructions: Pour the bitters into a wine glass. Swirl the glass to coat the inside with the bitters, shake out the excess. Pour the gin into the glass. Do not add ice.

fields.name: Pink Lady
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Poppy Cocktail
fields.instructions: White creme de cacao. Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Port And Starboard
fields.instructions: Pour carefully into a pousse-cafe glass, so that creme de menthe floats on grenadine. Serve without mixing.

fields.name: Port Wine Cocktail
fields.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Port Wine Flip
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

fields.name: Quaker's Cocktail
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Quarter Deck Cocktail
fields.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Queen Bee
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Queen Charlotte
fields.instructions: Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.

fields.name: Queen Elizabeth
fields.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Quentin
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Kahlua, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

fields.name: Royal Fizz
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass. Fill with cola and serve.

fields.name: Royal Gin Fizz
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

fields.name: Rum Cobbler
fields.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the rum. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

fields.name: Rum Cooler
fields.instructions: Pour the rum and soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

fields.name: Rum Milk Punch
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

fields.name: Rum Old-fashioned
fields.instructions: Stir powdered sugar, water, and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and light rum. Add the twist of lime peel, float 151 proof rum on top, and serve.

fields.name: Rum Screwdriver
fields.instructions: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.

fields.name: Rum Sour
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

fields.name: Rum Toddy
fields.instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in water in an old-fashioned glass. Add rum and one ice cube and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

fields.name: Rusty Nail
fields.instructions: Pour the Scotch and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

fields.name: Salty Dog
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)

fields.name: Sazerac
fields.instructions: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice, and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the lemon peel for garnish.

fields.name: Scooter
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Scotch Cobbler
fields.instructions: Pour scotch, brandy, and curacao over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add the orange slice, top with the mint sprig, and serve.

fields.name: Scotch Sour
fields.instructions: Shake scotch, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with 1/2 slice lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

fields.name: Screwdriver
fields.instructions: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.

fields.name: Shanghai Cocktail
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Sherry Eggnog
fields.instructions: Shake sherry, powdered sugar, and egg with ice and strain into a collins glass. Fill with milk and stir. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

fields.name: Sherry Flip
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

fields.name: Sidecar
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

fields.name: Singapore Sling
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into highball glass. Garnish with pineapple and cocktail cherry.

fields.name: Sloe Gin Cocktail
fields.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Sol Y Sombra
fields.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve. (The English translation of the name of this drink is "Sun and Shade", and after sampling this drink, you'll understand why. Thanks, Kirby.)

fields.name: Stone Sour
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass, and serve.

fields.name: Strawberry Daiquiri
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

fields.name: Strawberry Margarita
fields.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Shake schnapps, tequila, triple sec, lemon juice, and strawberries with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

fields.name: Tequila Fizz
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

fields.name: Tequila Sour
fields.instructions: Shake tequila, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

fields.name: Thriller
fields.instructions: Green ginger wine. In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

fields.name: Tom Collins
fields.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

fields.name: Turf Cocktail
fields.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

fields.name: Tuxedo Cocktail
fields.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest.

fields.name: Valencia Cocktail
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Van Vleet
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

fields.name: Vermouth Cassis
fields.instructions: Stir vermouth and creme de cassis in a highball glass with ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir again, and serve.

fields.name: Vesuvio
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

fields.name: Veteran
fields.instructions: Pour the rum and cherry brandy into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

fields.name: Victor
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Victory Collins
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

fields.name: Vodka And Tonic
fields.instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with tonic water, stir, and serve.

fields.name: Waikiki Beachcomber
fields.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

fields.name: Whisky Mac
fields.instructions: Green ginger wine. Pour both of the ingredients into a wine goblet with no ice.

fields.name: White Russian
fields.instructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.

fields.name: Imperial Cocktail
fields.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

fields.name: Lemon Shot
fields.instructions: Mix Galliano and Absolut Citron in a shot glass, lay lemon wedge sprinkled with sugar over glass and pour a rum over wedge and glass. light rum with a lighter and let burn for a second. Do shot quickly and suck on lemon. If it is done correctly, this will taste like a shot of sweet lemonade.

fields.name: Sex on the Beach
fields.instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.

fields.name: Gagliardo
fields.instructions: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass. This is a home cocktail of American/Internet Bar del Pozzo, Pavia, Italy.

fields.name: Surf City Lifesaver
fields.instructions: Lots of ice and soda top up in tall glass with cherry and a grin.

fields.name: Grizzly Bear
fields.instructions: Served over ice. Sounds nasty, but tastes great.

fields.name: Karsk
fields.instructions: Put a copper coin in a coffe-cup and fill up with coffee until you no longer see the coin, then add alcohol until you see the coin. Norwegian speciality.

fields.name: Happy Skipper
fields.instructions: Pour Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum over ice, fill glass to top with Ginger Ale. Garnish with lime. Tastes like a cream soda. Named for the Gilligan's Island reference ("The Captain" *in* "Ginger" is a Happy Skipper!)

fields.name: Iced Coffee Fillip
fields.instructions: Mix together in a coffee mug and chill before serving.

fields.name: Caribbean Orange Liqueur
fields.instructions: Pare very thinly the bright-colored rind from the oranges (no white). Blot the peel on paper towels to remove any excess oil. Put peel in a 4 cup screw-top jar. Add 2 cups vodka. Close jar. Store in a cool, dark place for 2 days or until the vodka has absorbed the flavor. Remove peel and add remaining vodka. Close jar and add remaining cup of vodka. Close the jar and store in a cool dark place at least 1 month to age.

fields.name: Coffee Liqueur
fields.instructions: Combine coffee, sugar and water. Simmer 1 hour and let cool. Add vanilla and vodka. Age in sealed jar 2 to 3 weeks.

fields.name: Coffee-Vodka
fields.instructions: Boil water and sugar until dissolved. Turn off heat. Slowly add dry instant coffee and continue stirring. Add a chopped vanilla bean to the vodka, then combine the cooled sugar syrup and coffee solution with the vodka. Cover tightly and shake vigorously each day for 3 weeks. Strain and filter. Its also best to let the sugar mixture cool completely so the vodka won't evaporate when its added. If you like a smoother feel to the liqueur you can add about 1 teaspoon of glycerine to the finished product.

fields.name: Cranberry Cordial
fields.instructions: Place the chopped cranberries in a 2 liter jar that has a tight-fitting lid. Add the sugar and rum. Adjust the lid securely and place the jar in a cool, dark place. Invert the jar and shake it every day for six weeks. Strain the cordial into bottles and seal with corks.

fields.name: Creme de Menthe
fields.instructions: Bring sugar and water to a boil and simmer for 10 minutes. Cool. Add the remaining ingredients and stir. Cover and let ripen for 1 month.

fields.name: Irish Cream
fields.instructions: Mix scotch and milk. Add half-and-half. Add rest.

fields.name: Scottish Highland Liqueur
fields.instructions: Combine all ingreds in aging container. Cover tightly and shake gently several times during the first 24 hrs. After 24 hrs, remove the lemon zest. Cover again and let stand in a cool, dark place for 2 weeks, shaking gently every other day. Strain through a wire sieve to remove the angelica root and fennel. Return to aging container, cover and let stand undisturbed in a cool dark place for 6 months. Siphon or pour clear liqueur into a sterile bottle. The cloudy dregs may be saved for cooking.

fields.name: Tia-Maria
fields.instructions: Boil water, sugar and coffe for 10 mins and let cool. Add rum and vanilla. Put in clean bottle(s) and leave for 1 week before using.

fields.name: Apple Cider Punch #1
fields.instructions: If you use the whole all spice and cloves, tie them in cheesecloth. Heat the mixture. Stir occasionally. If you want an alcoholic drink, rum would be nice.

fields.name: Artillery Punch
fields.instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a large punch bowl with a block of ice. If found too dry, sugar syrup may be added. Decorate with twists of lemon peel.

fields.name: Berry Deadly
fields.instructions: Add all ingredients to large bowl. Stir gently. Serve chilled.

fields.name: Egg-Nog - Classic Cooked
fields.instructions: In large saucepan, beat together eggs, sugar and salt, if desired. Stir in 2 cups of the milk. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is thick enough to coat a metal spoon and reaches 160 degrees F. Remove from heat. Stir in remaining 2 cups milk and vanilla. Cover and regfigerate until thoroughly chilled, several hours or overnight. Just before serving, pour into bowl or pitcher. Garnish or add stir-ins, if desired. Choose 1 or several of: Chocolate curls, cinnamon sticks, extracts of flavorings, flavored brandy or liqueur, fruit juice or nectar, ground nutmeg, maraschino cherries, orange slices, peppermint sticks or candy canes, plain brandy, run or whiskey, sherbet or ice-cream, whipping cream, whipped. Serve immediately.

fields.name: Gluehwein
fields.instructions: Boil sugar and spices in water, leave in the water for 30 minutes. Strain the spiced water and mix with the wine. Heat slowly until short of boiling temperature. (To remove alcohol, let it boil for a while.) You may add lemon or orange juice to taste. Serve in irish coffee cup.

fields.name: Mulled Wine
fields.instructions: Simmer 3 cups water with, sugar, cloves, cinnamon sticks, and lemon peel in a stainless steel pot for 10 minutes. Add wine heat to a "coffee temperature" (DO NOT BOIL) then add the brandy.

fields.name: Sangria #1
fields.instructions: Mix all together in a pitcher and refrigerate. Add cloves and cinnamon sticks to taste. Serve in wine glasses.

fields.name: Sweet Sangria
fields.instructions: Dissolve the sugar in hot water and cool. Peel the citrus fruits and break into wedges. Mix the wine, sugar syrup, fruit, and Fresca in a pitcher and put in the fridge for a few hours. Serve in tall glasses with a straw.

fields.name: Sangria - The World's Best
fields.instructions: Mix wine, sugar and fruit, and let sit in the fridge for 18-24 hours. The mixture will have a somewhat syrupy consistency. Before serving stir in brandy and cut the mixture with soda water until it have a thinner, more wine like consistency. Serve from a pitcher in wine glasses.

fields.name: Sunny Holiday Punch
fields.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl.

fields.name: Wine Cooler
fields.instructions: Mix wine and soft drink. Pour into glass. Add ice.

fields.name: Wine Punch
fields.instructions: Combine all of the ingredients and pour over a block of ice.

fields.name: Bruce's Puce
fields.instructions: In a regular-sized shot glass, layer, with a spoon or cherry, the grenadine , the Kahlua , then the Bailey's Irish cream in equal portions. It goes down really smooth ,and you don't even need a chaser. It tastes just like chocolate milk.(Really!)

fields.name: Brave Bull Shooter
fields.instructions: Pour Tabasco into bottom of shot glass and fill with tequila.

fields.name: Fahrenheit 5000
fields.instructions: Cover bottom of shot glass with Tabasco Sauce and then fill with half Firewater and half Absolut Peppar.

fields.name: Popped cherry
fields.instructions: Served over ice in a tall glass with a popped cherry (can add more popped cherries if in the mood)!

fields.name: Atomic Lokade
fields.instructions: In a shaker, place lemonade, vodka, blue Curacao, and triple sec together. Shake with ice and strain into glass. Add sugar to taste

fields.name: Diesel
fields.instructions: Pour the lager first then add the blackcurrant cordial. Top up with the cider. The colour sholud be very dark approaching the colour of Guiness.

fields.name: Afternoon
fields.instructions: Build into a suiting glass, with no ice. Cream on top if wanted. Served directly.

fields.name: Kool-Aid Shot
fields.instructions: Pour into a large glass with ice and stir. Add a little cranberry juice to taste.

fields.name: National Aquarium
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker of ice. Shake well. Serve on the rocks.

fields.name: Damned if you do
fields.instructions: Pour into shot glass. Put in mouth. Repeat as deemed necessary.

fields.name: Long vodka
fields.instructions: Shake a tall glass with ice cubes and Angostura, coating the inside of the glass. Por the vodka onto this, add 1 slice of lime and squeeze juice out of remainder, mix with tonic, stir and voila you have a Long Vodka

fields.name: Quick F**K
fields.instructions: In a shot glass add 1/3 Kahlua first. Then 1/3 Miduri, topping it off with a 1/3 bailey's irish cream

fields.name: Owen's Grandmother's Revenge
fields.instructions: Add ingredients and mix in blender.

fields.name: Flaming Dr. Pepper
fields.instructions: Add Amaretto, Bacardi, and vodka. Mix in the Dr. Pepper and beer

fields.name: New York Lemonade
fields.instructions: Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Lemon and sugar the rim. Stir and Strain.

fields.name: Caipirissima
fields.instructions: Same as Caipirinha but instead of cachaca you add WHITE RUM. It's great!!!

fields.name: Pisco Sour
fields.instructions: Vigorously shake and strain contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then pour into glass and garnish with bitters.[1]

fields.name: Big Red
fields.instructions: Pour ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass

fields.name: Black & Tan
fields.instructions: Fill pint glass half full with Bass. Next pour Guiness over a spoon slowly until glass is full. If done correctly the Guiness will stay on top and the Bass on bottom hence the name Black & Tan.

fields.name: Chocolate Milk
fields.instructions: Put the milk in the bottom, pour the Liquer on top and add the dash of amaretto. Do not mix. SLAM IT!

fields.name: B-53
fields.instructions: Layer the Kahlua, Sambucca and Grand Marnier into a shot glas in that order. Better than B-52

fields.name: Sea breeze
fields.instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

fields.name: Snake Bite (UK)
fields.instructions: Pour ingredients into a pint glass. Drink. Fall over.

fields.name: Bob Marley
fields.instructions: Layer in a 2 oz shot glass or pony glass

fields.name: Brainteaser
fields.instructions: layered erin first, then sambuca and then avocart(should sit in middle of other two. To drink: use a straw to suck up avocart then shot the rest and then suck fumes up through straw.

fields.name: Atlantic Sun
fields.instructions: Shake all the ingredients, top the drink with soda. Garnish with a slice of orange.

fields.name: Green Goblin
fields.instructions: Cider First, Lager then Curacao

fields.name: Oreo Mudslide
fields.instructions: Blend Vodka, Kahlua, Bailey's, ice-cream and the Oreo well in a blender. Pour into a large frosted glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a cherry.

fields.name: ABC
fields.instructions: Layered in a shot glass.

fields.name: Pink Panty Pulldowns
fields.instructions: Shake well

fields.name: Ice Pick #1
fields.instructions: Put Vodka in glass fill with iced tea. Stir in lemon to taste.

fields.name: 410 Gone
fields.instructions: Pour vodka into collins or low ball glass. Top with coke.

fields.name: Tequila Sunrise
fields.instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom. Stir gently to create the sunrise effect. Garnish and serve.

fields.name: Screaming Orgasm
fields.instructions: Pour first vodka, then Bailey's, then Kahlua into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Stir. Caution: use only high quality vodka. Cheap vodka can cause the Bailey's to curdle. Test your brand of vodka by mixing 1 Tsp each of vodka and Bailey's first.

fields.name: Flander's Flake-Out
fields.instructions: Bang 'em both in.

fields.name: Apple Slammer
fields.instructions: pour into a shot glass and present to consumer, they are expected to cover the top of the shotglass with thier palm, raise the glass, slam it on the bar and the swallow quickly.

fields.name: Amaretto Sour
fields.instructions: Shake and strain. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

fields.name: Jelly Bean
fields.instructions: mix equal parts in pony glass-tastes just like a jelly bean!

fields.name: After Five
fields.instructions: 1. Pour Kahlua into shot glass to about 1/2 full. 2. Using a spoon(inverted), slowly pour in the Peppermint Schnapps until glass is about 3/4 full. Done correctly, the Schnapps will flow under the Kahlua for a clear layer. 3. Again using a spoon, but this time right side up, slowly top off the glass with a layer of Bailey's. Be careful to place the spoon right at the top of the Kahlua layer and to raise it as the glass fills up. Done correctly, this will provide a layer of Bailey's floating over the Kahlua. 4. Toss it down all at once for something like a Peppermint Pattie, WITH A BANG!!! NOTE: Best if all ingredients are chilled

fields.name: Midnight Manx
fields.instructions: Fill a mixer with ice and add Baileys, Kahlua, Goldshlager, and cream. Shake for 5 seconds and Strain into a double rocks glass filled with ice. Add chilled coffee Stir and enjoy!

fields.name: Kir Royale
fields.instructions: Pour Creme de cassis in glass, gently pour champagne on top

fields.name: Jackhammer
fields.instructions: Serve over ice- Warning,Deadly!

fields.name: Nutty Irishman
fields.instructions: Serve over ice

fields.name: 3 Wise Men
fields.instructions: put them them in a glass... and slam it to tha head.

fields.name: Miami Vice
fields.instructions: First: Mix pina colada with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice(set aside). Second: Mix daiquiri with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice. Third: While frozen, add pina colda mix then daiquiri mix in glass (Making sure they do not get mixed together).

fields.name: AT&T
fields.instructions: Pour Vodka and Gin over ice, add Tonic and Stir

fields.name: 69 Special
fields.instructions: Pour 2 oz. gin. Add 4 oz. 7-up. Add Lemon Juice for flavor. If you are weak, top up glass with more 7-Up.

fields.name: Irish Coffee
fields.instructions: Heat the coffee, whiskey and sugar; do not boil. Pour into glass and top with cream; serve hot.

fields.name: '57 Chevy with a White License Plate
fields.instructions: 1. Fill a rocks glass with ice 2.add white creme de cacao and vodka 3.stir

fields.name: Mother's Milk
fields.instructions: Shake over ice, strain. Serves two.

fields.name: Zippy's Revenge
fields.instructions: Mix Kool-Aid to taste then add Rum and ammaretto. shake well to disolve the sugar in the Kool-Aid... serve cold

fields.name: Belgian Blue
fields.instructions: Just pour all ingredients in the glass and stir...

fields.name: Red Snapper
fields.instructions: One shot each, shake n shoot

fields.name: Jamaica Kiss
fields.instructions: Fill a tumbler with ice cubes. Add a shot of Tia Maria and a shot of Jamaican light rum. Fill the tumbler with milk. Blend until smooth and serve immediately.

fields.name: Absolut Summertime
fields.instructions: Add all ingredients except lemon to shaker filled with ice. Cover and shake vigorously. Strain contents into ice filled collins glass. Garnish with lemon.

fields.name: Cosmopolitan Martini
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients in mixing glass half filled with ice, shake and strain into chilled Martini glass.

fields.name: Ziemes Martini Apfelsaft
fields.instructions: Serve without ice. At least the juice shold have room temperature.

fields.name: Vodka Martini
fields.instructions: Shake the vodka and vermouth together with a number of ice cubes, strain into a cocktail glass, add the olive and serve.

fields.name: Cafe Savoy
fields.instructions: Fill mug almost to top with coffee. Add milk, triple sec and brandy. Stir.

fields.name: Snowball
fields.instructions: Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1 1/2 oz of Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.

fields.name: Mocha-Berry
fields.instructions: pour 6 oz. of coffee in a mug or Irish coffee cup. add coca mix and chambord, mix well and top off with whipped cream.
pour kaluha, then Baileys, then Frangelico not chilled and not layered -- SERVE!!!

fields.name: Addison Special
fields.instructions: Combine ingredients in the order listed into a shaker. Fill half full with ice and shake well. Strain into glass with ice and garnish with a cherry and orange wedge.

fields.name: California Root Beer
fields.instructions: Put Kahlua and Galliano in highball glass fill with soda

fields.name: Amaretto Stone Sour
fields.instructions: Shake and Serve over ice

fields.name: Blind Russian
fields.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add all liquers. Add milk. shake.

fields.name: Absolut Sex
fields.instructions: Shake Absolut Kurant, Midori, and Cranberry juice in shaker with ice: Strain into rocks glass: Splash of seven on top.Absolut Sex.

fields.name: Aztec Punch
fields.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a pitcher. Mix thoroughly and pour into whatever is available, the bigger the better! This drink packs a big punch, so don't over do it.

fields.name: Lemon Drop
fields.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

fields.name: Absolut limousine
fields.instructions: Fill Absolut into a glass. Add Lime juice. Add Ice and lime wedges.

fields.name: Absolut Evergreen
fields.instructions: Mix, pour over ice and top up with Bitter Lemon.

fields.name: Lunch Box
fields.instructions: Fill a pint glass almost full with beer. Then fill the rest with orange juice (careful not to fill it to the top). Then take the shot of Amaretto and drop it in.

fields.name: Kool-Aid Slammer
fields.instructions: Fill half the shot glass with the kool-aid first. Then put a paper towel over the top of the glass and slowly pour in the vodka. If you do it right, you should be able to see that the two liquids are separated, with the vodka on top. Now slam it! The last thing you'll taste is the kool-aid.

fields.name: Kurant Tea
fields.instructions: Pour Absolut Kurant into a comfortably big tea-cup. Add the not too hot(!) apple tea and, if you like, some sugar. Enjoy!

fields.name: Dirty Nipple
fields.instructions: This is a layered shot - the Bailey's must be on top

fields.name: Darkwood Sling
fields.instructions: There are many good cherry liqueurs you can use, but I prefere Heering. Add one share of the liqueur. Then you add one share of Soda. For a sour sling use Tonic (most people prefer the drink without Tonic). Afterwards you fill the glass with Orange Juice and ice cubes.

fields.name: Bailey's Dream Shake
fields.instructions: Blend ingredients for 30 seconds. Definitely refreshing for a hot summer's day !

fields.name: Bumble Bee #1
fields.instructions: This is a layered shot. First pour the Bailey's into the shot glass. Then take an upside down spoon and touch it to the inside wall of the glass. Carefully add the Kahlua. Repeat this process for the Sambuca. If done properly, the alcohol will stay separated and resemble a bumble bee. Enjoy!!!

fields.name: A.D.M. (After Dinner Mint)
fields.instructions: shake vigorously

fields.name: A Splash of Nash
fields.instructions: Drop shot glass with banana & melon liquers into a 9 oz hi- ball glass containing soda water and cranberry juice. Drink in one shot.

fields.name: Amaretto Sunrise
fields.instructions: Mix together the amaretto and orange juice. Pour into glass and then add the grenadine untill you see the sunrise.

fields.name: Arizona Stingers
fields.instructions: Place ice cubes in the hurricane glass . Add the 2 HEAPING shots of Absolute Vodka (Note: You can add as many shots of Absolute as you want!) Fill the rest of glass with the Arizona Icetea with lemon. Stir to mix using a spoon. Drink up and enjoy!!!!!!!

fields.name: Orange Push-up
fields.instructions: Combine liquors in a blender. Add a half scoop of ice and blend. Garnish with an orange and cherry flag. So good it will melt in your mouth!!!

fields.name: 151 Florida Bushwacker
fields.instructions: Combine all ingredients. Blend until smooth. Garnish with chocolate shavings if desired.

fields.name: Zizi Coin-coin
fields.instructions: Pour 5cl of Cointreau on ice, add 2cl of fresh lemon (or lime) juice, stir gently, and finally add slices of lemon/lime in glass.
fill glass with crushed ice. Add vodka. Add a splash of grand-marnier. Fill with o.j.

fields.name: Tequila Surprise
fields.instructions: Fill shot glass with Tequila. Add drops of Tobasco sauce.

fields.name: Cream Soda
fields.instructions: Pour 1oz of Spiced Rum into a highball glass with ice. Fill with Ginger Ale.

fields.name: ACID
fields.instructions: Poor in the 151 first followed by the 101 served with a Coke or Dr Pepper chaser.

fields.name: Arctic Fish
fields.instructions: Fill glass with ice and fish, add vodka, grape soda and orange juice. DO NOT STIR!!!!! Serve well chilled.

fields.name: Grim Reaper
fields.instructions: Mix Kahlua and 151 in glass. Quickly add ice and pour grenadine over ice to give ice red tint.

fields.name: Freddy Kruger
fields.instructions: make it an ample size shot!!

fields.name: Bubble Gum
fields.instructions: Layer in order into a shot glass.

fields.name: Kiwi Lemon
fields.instructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of kiwi.

fields.name: Hot Creamy Bush
fields.instructions: Combine all ingredients in glass

fields.name: Midnight Mint
fields.instructions: If available, rim cocktail (Martini) glass with sugar syrup then dip into chocolate flakes or powder. Add ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well then strain into cocktail glass.

fields.name: Talos Coffee
fields.instructions: Add your GM and then add your coffee.

fields.name: Zinger
fields.instructions: Get a shot glass and pour in three shots of the schnapps. Do the same with the Surge Cola. Then down it like Scheetz would.

fields.name: Jello shots
fields.instructions: Boil 3 cups of water then add jello. Mix jello and water until jello is completely disolved. Add the two cups of vodka and mix together. Pour mixture into plastic shot glasses and chill until firm. Then, eat away...

fields.name: Rum Punch
fields.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl and serve.

fields.name: Turkeyball
fields.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

fields.name: Absolutely Cranberry Smash
fields.instructions: Stir ingredients together. Serve over ice.

fields.name: Kiss me Quick
fields.instructions: mix in the glass

fields.name: Royal Flush
fields.instructions: Pour all the ingredients into tumbler over ice. Strain into glass.

fields.name: Limona Corona
fields.instructions: Open the Corona. Fill the empty space in the neck in the bottle with the rum. The bottle should be filled to the top. Plug the bottle with your thumb or the palm of your hand. Turn the bottle upside-down so the rum and beer mix. Turn the bottle rightside-up, unplug, and drink.

fields.name: Texas Rattlesnake
fields.instructions: Mix all ingredients and Shake well. Sweet at first, with a BITE at the end...

fields.name: After sex
fields.instructions: Pour the vodka and creme over some ice cubes in a tall glass and fill up with juice. to make it beuty full make the top of the glass with a grenadine and sugar

fields.name: San Francisco
fields.instructions: Take a tall glass and put in a few ice cubes, fill the vodka over it and fill with juice then the "creme", to end fill in the grenadine but very carefully at the side of the glass so it will lay down in the bottom. garnish with orange and strawberry.

fields.name: Amaretto Shake
fields.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend at high speed until smooth. Serve in chilled glass garnished with bittersweet chocolate shavings.

fields.name: A Day at the Beach
fields.instructions: Shake Rum, Amaretto, and Orange Juice in a shaker filled with ice. Strain over ice into a highball glass. Add Grenadine and garnish with a Pineapple Wedge and a Strawberry.

fields.name: Malibu Twister
fields.instructions: Add rum & trister then, add cranberry jucie,stir

fields.name: Space Odyssey
fields.instructions: Fill glass with ice and add shots of Bacardi and Malibu. Add splash of pineapple juice and top with orange juice. Add grenadine for color and garnish with cherries.

fields.name: Zenmeister
fields.instructions: Mix together and enjoy

fields.name: Avalon
fields.instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice. Layer the Finlandia Vodka, lemon and apple juices, Pisang Ambon, and top up with lemonade. Stir slightly and garnish with a spiralled cucumber skin and a red cherry. The cucumber provides zest and looks attractive. This drink, created by Timo Haimi, took first prize in the 1991 Finlandia Vodka Long Drink Competition.

fields.name: 3-Mile Long Island Iced Tea
fields.instructions: Fill 14oz glass with ice and alcohol. Fill 2/3 glass with cola and remainder with sweet & sour. Top with dash of bitters and lemon wedge.

fields.name: Zorro
fields.instructions: add all and pour black coffee and add whipped cream on top.

fields.name: Orange Crush
fields.instructions: Add all ingredients to tumbler-Pour as shot

fields.name: 155 Belmont
fields.instructions: Blend with ice. Serve in a wine glass. Garnish with carrot.

fields.name: Vodka Russian
fields.instructions: Mix it as a ordinary drink .

fields.name: Danbooka
fields.instructions: pour it in and mix it.

fields.name: 110 in the shade
fields.instructions: Drop shooter in glass. Fill with beer

fields.name: Grand Blue
fields.instructions: Serve in an old fashioned glass.

fields.name: Baby Eskimo
fields.instructions: Leave ice-cream out for about 10 minutes. Add ingredients in order, stir with chopstick (butter knife or spoon works too). Consume immediately and often. Nice and light, great for following a heavy drink.

fields.name: Tennesee Mud
fields.instructions: Mix Coffee, Jack Daniels and Amaretto. Add Cream on top.

fields.name: Swedish Coffee
fields.instructions: Pour the coffee in an ordinary coffee cup. Add the aquavit. Add sugar by taste. Stir and have a nice evening (morning)

fields.name: Adam Sunrise
fields.instructions: Fill blender up with ice. Fill half with Bartons Vodka. Put 10 tsp of sugar, add 1/2 can lemonade concentrate, fill to top with water. Blend for 60 seconds.

fields.name: Absolut Stress #2
fields.instructions: Mix well. Garnish with Orange and Cherry. Enjoy

fields.name: Chocolate Monkey
fields.instructions: blend liqeuors with ice-cream, milk and syrup. pour into parfait glass, top with whipped cream and garnish with banana and cherry.

fields.name: Texas Sling
fields.instructions: Blend with Ice until smooth. Serve in a tulip glass, top with whip cream.

fields.name: A midsummernight dream
fields.instructions: Mix the strawberrys in a blender Pour it together with the vodka,kirch and strawberry liquer over ice in a shaker. Shake well and pour in a highballglass. Fill up with the Russchian water

fields.name: Zoksel
fields.instructions: No specific mixinginstructions, just poor every ingredient in one glass. The lemon goes with it.

fields.name: Fuzzy Asshole
fields.instructions: fill coffe mug half full of coffee. Fill the other half full of Peach Schnapps. Stir and drink while hot.

fields.name: Quick-sand
fields.instructions: Simply add the orange juice, quite a quick pour in order to mix the sambucca with the orange juice. The juice MUST have fruit pulp!

fields.name: Snakebite and Black
fields.instructions: Put blackcurrant squash in first up to about 1cm in glass. Then add the larger and cider one after another.

fields.name: Herbal flame
fields.instructions: Pour Hot Damn 100 in bottom of a jar or regular glass. Fill the rest of the glass with sweet tea. Stir with spoon, straw, or better yet a cinnamon stick and leave it in.

fields.name: Jamaican Coffee
fields.instructions: Stir the rum, coffee and water together. Top with the whipped cream. Sprinkle with a pinch of well ground coffee and drink with a straw.

fields.name: Mojito #3
fields.instructions: Put mint with lemon juice in a glas, mash the mint with a spoon, ice, rum & fill up with club soda. Top it with Angostura.

fields.name: Apricot punch
fields.instructions: Pour all ingrediants into a large punch bowl. Add ice and 4 oranges that are peeled and divided.

fields.name: B-52
fields.instructions: Layer ingredients into a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.

fields.name: Zambeer
fields.instructions: Mix sambuca with rootbeer and stir. Add ice

fields.name: Americano
fields.instructions: Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice.

fields.name: Black Forest Shake
fields.instructions: In a blender put ice cubes, chocolate syrup, cherry brandy, vodka, and milk. Blend very well.

fields.name: GG
fields.instructions: Pour the Galliano liqueur over ice. Fill the remainder of the glass with ginger ale and thats all there is to it. You now have a your very own GG.

fields.name: Radler
fields.instructions: Pour beer into large mug, slowly add the 7-up (or Sprite).

fields.name: Mudslinger
fields.instructions: Add all contents to a large jug or punch bowl. Stir well!

fields.name: Campari Beer
fields.instructions: Use a 15 oz glass. Add Campari first. Fill with beer.

fields.name: Almond Chocolate Coffee
fields.instructions: Pour in order into coffee cup. Top with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

fields.name: Amaretto Stone Sour #3
fields.instructions: Shake sour mix, tequila and amaretto with ice. Strain into highball glass. Add a splash of OJ. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

fields.name: 9 1/2 Weeks
fields.instructions: Combine all ingredients in glass mixer. Chill and strain into Cocktail glass. Garnish with sliced strawberry.

fields.name: Absolutly Screwed Up
fields.instructions: Shake it up it tasts better that way, but you can stir it if you want. 6 of those and you will be wasted for the rest of the night.

fields.name: Whitecap Margarita
fields.instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. This makes one drink.

fields.name: Bellini Martini
fields.instructions:
Add ice cubes to shaker.
Add vodka.
Add peach schnapps.
Add peach nectar.
Shake.
Strain into glass.
Add lemon twist peel.

fields.name: Jitterbug
fields.instructions: Wet glass, dip rim in sugar. Then add Ice. Then add everything else. It's that simple!

fields.name: Moranguito
fields.instructions: first you put rhe absinthe, then put tequila, then put the Granadine syrup.

fields.name: Amaretto Sweet & Sour
fields.instructions: Fill the blender with 3/4 ice. Add sweet & sour mix to the top of the ice. Add about 1" of pineapple juice, 1/2" of melon liqeur, and 1/2 to 1/4" of amaretto. Then blend the mix until it is of margaritta consistency or thinner.

fields.name: Rum Runner
fields.instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass & add ice.

fields.name: H.D.
fields.instructions: Mix the whisky and Baileys Cream in a beer-glass (at least 50 cl). Fill the rest of the glass with coffee.

fields.name: The Evil Blue Thing
fields.instructions: Pour ingredients into glass, and drop in a blue whale! The blue whale isn't really necessary, but it makes the drink more "fun".

fields.name: Shark Attack
fields.instructions: Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can. If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so. Mix into pitcher. Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut). Mix well. Pour into glass of crushed ice. Excellent!

fields.name: Jack's Vanilla Coke
fields.instructions: After pouring in your ingredients, and adding 3-5 ice cubes, according to taste. Stir the drink with a stirrer to get the Vanilla off the bottom.

fields.name: Apple Grande
fields.instructions: Chill both ingredients!! Mix in a tumbler and enjoy!

fields.name: Bleeding Surgeon
fields.instructions: Pour Shot of Rum over slice of orange. Fill the remaining space in glass half way full of surge or similar drink. Finish off glass with cranberry juice. Be carefull, warm surge may foam over the glass.

fields.name: Applejack
fields.instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass, chill and strain into cocktail glass

fields.name: Adam Bomb
fields.instructions: Add ice to blender (or to glass if prefer on the rocks) then fruit, and fruit juice depending on personal preference then add the Rum, Vodka, Tequila, and triple sec. blend till smooth, rim glass with sugar or salt and pour mixture in. garnish with lemon or lime slice.

fields.name: Arizona Antifreeze
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shot glass and slam !!!!

fields.name: Black and Brown
fields.instructions: CAREFULLY to avoid explosive head formation: Pour Beer glass half full of favorite rootbeer and top off with Guinness.

fields.name: A Piece of Ass
fields.instructions: Put ice in glass. Pour in shots. Fill with Sour Mix.

fields.name: Avalanche
fields.instructions: Mix in highball glass over ice, shake well.

fields.name: Brandon and Will's Coke Float
fields.instructions: Scoop two large scoops of vanilla ice-cream into frosted beer mug. Next, add 2 ounces Maker's Mark. Then, pour in coke. Gently stir and enjoy.

fields.name: Flaming Lamborghini
fields.instructions: Pour the Sambuca and Kahlua into the Cocktail Glass and give the drinker a straw. Pour the Baileys and Blue Curacao into two sepsrate shot glasses either side of the cocktail glass. Set light the concotion in the cocktail glass and start to drink through the straw (this drink should be drunk in one) , as the bottom of the glass is reached put out the fire by pouring the Baileys and Blue Curacao into the cocktail glass and keep drinking till it's all gone!!

fields.name: Zipperhead
fields.instructions: Fill glass with rocks, add straw before putting in liquor. Then add the ingredients in order, trying to keep layered as much as possible (i.e. Chambord on bottom, then Vodka, Then soda on top).

fields.name: A Gilligan's Island
fields.instructions: Shaken, not stirred!

fields.name: Kioki Coffee
fields.instructions: Stir. Add whipped cream to the top.

fields.name: Apple Pie with A Crust
fields.instructions: Just mix the two liquids and sprinkle in the cinnamon. Serve either cold or heated.

fields.name: Zorbatini
fields.instructions: Prepare like a Martini. Garnish with a green olive.

fields.name: Vodka Fizz
fields.instructions: Blend all ingredients, save nutmeg. Pour into large white wine glass and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

fields.name: Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a very tall glass. Sip cautiously.

fields.name: Shot-gun
fields.instructions: Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top.

fields.name: Bible Belt
fields.instructions: Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice.

fields.name: Irish Curdling Cow
fields.instructions: Pour Irish Cream, Vodka, and Bourbon in a glass. Add some ice and mix in the orange juice.

fields.name: Sweet Tooth
fields.instructions: Put 2 shots Godiva Liquour into a glass, add as much or as little milk as you would like.

fields.name: Downshift
fields.instructions: Start with the Sprite. Next comes the tequila. After that, add the Minute Maid Fruit Punch, then float the 151. Rocks optional.

fields.name: Pink Penocha
fields.instructions: mix all ingredients into bowl keep iced stir frequently

fields.name: Orange Whip
fields.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

fields.name: Bruised Heart
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients in a mixing tin over ice, stir, and strain into shot glass

fields.name: Gideon's Green Dinosaur
fields.instructions: Add all ingredients in collins glass with ice and stir.

fields.name: A True Amaretto Sour
fields.instructions: Rub the rim of an old fashioned glass with lemon, and dip repeatedly into granulated sugar until it has a good "frosted" rim. Shake a jigger of Amaretto with the juice of 1/2 a lemon. Strain into glass and add ice. Garnish with a Marachino Cherry.

fields.name: Kool First Aid
fields.instructions: Add Kool Aid to a double shot glass, and top with rum. Slam and shoot.

fields.name: Irish Russian
fields.instructions: Add the ingredients in the order listed in the recipe. Care must be taken when adding the Guinness to prevent an excess of foam. Do Not add ice.

fields.name: Auburn Headbanger
fields.instructions: Mix in spread glass over ice. Strain and pour in shot glass. Sit down before shotting. ENJOY!!

fields.name: Buccaneer
fields.instructions: Pour the corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the bacardi limon into the beer stir very gently

fields.name: Homemade Kahlua
fields.instructions: Dissolve sugar in 2 cups of boiling water and add corn syrup. Dissolve the instant coffee in the remaining water. Pour syrup and coffee in a gallon jug. Let it cool. Add vodka and vanilla when cold. For the best result, let the mixture "mature" for 4-5 weeks.

fields.name: 24k nightmare
fields.instructions: Add over ice,shake and pour.

fields.name: Caribbean Boilermaker
fields.instructions: Pour the Corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the rum into the beer.

fields.name: Army special
fields.instructions: Pour Vodka, Gin and lime cordial into glass, and top up with crushed ice. Wait for ice to melt slightly and sip without a straw.

fields.name: Arizona Twister
fields.instructions: Just mix in the shots of rum, vodka, and tequila. Add splashes of the three juices, heavy on the pineapple. Top off with grenadine. Crushed ice should already be in glass. Top off the glass with a pineapple wedge.

fields.name: Baby Guinness
fields.instructions: Pour Kahlua, almost filling shot glass. Then, carefully pour Baileys, using wall of shot glass. This will give the "Guinness" its "head".

fields.name: Alice in Wonderland
fields.instructions: Just mix the three ingredients one to one to one

fields.name: 501 Blue
fields.instructions: Mix equal amounts into a glass with ice.

fields.name: Ruby Tuesday
fields.instructions: Pour gin and cranberry into a highball filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and stir.

fields.name: Arctic Mouthwash
fields.instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender on high until ice is finely crushed. It should be of a slushy consistency. Pour immediately and serve.

fields.name: Brain Fart
fields.instructions: Mix all ingredients together. Slowly and gently. Works best if ice is added to punch bowl and soda's are very cold.

fields.name: Royal Bitch
fields.instructions: Into a shot glass layer the Crown Royal on top of the Frangelico.

fields.name: Citrus Coke
fields.instructions: Pour half of coke in a glass. Then add Bacardi and top it off with the remaining coke. Stir and drink up!

fields.name: Smut
fields.instructions: Throw it all together and serve real cold.

fields.name: Raspberry Cooler
fields.instructions: Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

fields.name: Amaretto Sunset
fields.instructions: Shake ingredients in bartender's mixer quickly, just 5 shakes. Strain out ice, serve in glass immediately with a slice of orange.

fields.name: Cherry Electric Lemonade
fields.instructions: Now stir vigorously and then pour over a large cup of ice. Now drink it with a straw and stir occasionally.

fields.name: Girl From Ipanema
fields.instructions: Add the cachaca, lemon juice and syrup to your boston glass. Add ice and shake until ice cold. Pour into a chilled flute and top-up with Champagne

fields.name: Ipamena
fields.instructions: Cut half a lime into pieces, place in a shaker, add the sugar and crush. Measure the passion fruit juice, add it to the shaker and fill up with ice cubes. Close the shaker and shake vigorously. Pour the liquid into a glass, top up with ginger ale, stir with a teaspoon and then garnish the rim of the glass with a slice of lime

fields.name: Dark Caipirinha
fields.instructions:
Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in an old-fashioned glass.
Fill the glass with ice cubes.
Pour the cachaca into the glass.
Stir well.

fields.name: Jam Donut
fields.instructions: Coat the rim of a shot glass with sugar using sugar syrup to stick. Add the Chambord raspberry liqueur to the shot glass, and carefully layer the Baileys Irish Cream on top. Serve.

fields.name: Aviation
fields.instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

fields.name: Dirty Martini
fields.instructions:
Pour the vodka, dry vermouth and olive brine into a cocktail shaker with a handful of ice and shake well.
Rub the rim of a martini glass with the wedge of lemon.
Strain the contents of the cocktail shaker into the glass and add the olive.
A dirty Martini contains a splash of olive brine or olive juice and is typically garnished with an olive.

fields.name: Duchamp's Punch
fields.instructions:
Shake all ingredients.
Double strain in a chilled double old fashioned glass with abig ice cube.
Garnish with a couple of lavender sprigs

fields.name: Bacardi Cocktail
fields.instructions: Shake together with ice. Strain into glass and serve.

fields.name: Between The Sheets
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

fields.name: Casino
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry. Serve without a straw.

fields.name: Clover Club
fields.instructions: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.

fields.name: Derby
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint in the drink.

fields.name: Mary Pickford
fields.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass

fields.name: Monkey Gland
fields.instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

fields.name: Paradise
fields.instructions: Shake together over ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

fields.name: Planter's Punch
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, "on top". Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.

fields.name: Porto flip
fields.instructions: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

fields.name: Stinger
fields.instructions: Pour in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a cocktail glass. May also be served on rocks in a rocks glass.

fields.name: White Lady
fields.instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.

fields.name: Bellini
fields.instructions: Pour peach purée into chilled flute, add sparkling wine. Stir gently.

fields.name: Cosmopolitan
fields.instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and double strain into large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

fields.name: French Connection
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

fields.name: Golden dream
fields.instructions: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into glass and serve.

fields.name: Grasshopper
fields.instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

fields.name: Hemingway Special
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake.

fields.name: Horse's Neck
fields.instructions: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If desired, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.

fields.name: Kir
fields.instructions: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine.

fields.name: Long Island Iced Tea
fields.instructions: Mix all contents in a highball glass and sitr gently. Add dash of Coca-Cola for the coloring and garnish with lemon or lime twist.

fields.name: Mimosa
fields.instructions: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.

fields.name: Mint Julep
fields.instructions: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted. Garnish with a mint sprig.

fields.name: Pina Colada
fields.instructions: Mix with crushed ice in blender until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish and serve.

fields.name: Rose
fields.instructions: Shake together in a cocktail shaker, then strain into chilled glass. Garnish and serve.

fields.name: Barracuda
fields.instructions: Shake pour ingredients with ice. Strain into glass, top with Sparkling wine.

fields.name: Bramble
fields.instructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Build gin, lemon juice and simple syrup over. Stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect. Garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice.

fields.name: Dark and Stormy
fields.instructions: In a highball glass filled with ice add 2oz dark rum and top with ginger beer. Garnish with lime wedge.

fields.name: Espresso Martini
fields.instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass

fields.name: French Martini
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

fields.name: Russian Spring Punch
fields.instructions: Pour the ingredients into an highball glass, top with Sparkling wine.

fields.name: Spritz
fields.instructions: Build into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

fields.name: Tommy's Margarita
fields.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

fields.name: Vampiro
fields.instructions: Vampiros may be made in a tall glass or an old fashioned glass. Bartenders may first "rim" the glass with Kosher Salt, which is done by placing a layer of Kosher Salt on a chopping board, moistening the glass' rim with lime juice or water, and then placing the upside down glass rim onto the Kosher Salt, so that the salt sticks to the moistened rim. The second step is to fill half the glass with ice and add one or two shooter glasses full of high quality Tequila. The next stage is to add the flavouring elements. This is done by squeezing a fresh lime into the glass, adding a few grains of salt, adding citrus-flavoured soda pop, until the glass is 4/5 full, and then adding spicy Viuda de Sanchez (or orange juice, lime juice and pico de gallo). The final step is to stir the ingredients so that the flavours are properly blended.

fields.name: Vesper
fields.instructions: Shake over ice until well chilled, then strain into a deep goblet and garnish with a thin slice of lemon peel.

fields.name: Yellow Bird
fields.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

fields.name: Butter Baby
fields.instructions: Blend together in a blender. Serve in a chilled Beer mug with Fresh Blueberries and caramel for topping.

fields.name: Boozy Snickers Milkshake
fields.instructions: Place the snickers bars in a plastic bag and roll over them with a rolling pin until crushed. Add crushed snickers pieces, ice cream, milk, caramel sauce, chocolate sauce, and chocolate liquor to a blender. Blend until shake is thick and frothy. Pour into glasses and top with chocolate liquor and whip cream.

fields.name: A1
fields.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, mix and serve over ice into a chilled glass.

fields.name: Abbey Martini
fields.instructions: Put all ingredients into a shaker and mix, then strain contents into a chilled cocktail glass.

fields.name: Absolutely Fabulous
fields.instructions: Mix the Vodka and Cranberry juice together in a shaker and strain into a glass. Top up with Champagne.

fields.name: Ace
fields.instructions: Shake all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker and ice then strain in a cold glass.

fields.name: Adam & Eve
